CheckTitle: Ensure no EC2 instances allow ingress from the internet to Cassandra ports (TCP 7000, 7001, 7199, 9042, 9160).
Description: Ensure no EC2 instances allow ingress from the internet to Cassandra ports (TCP 7000, 7001, 7199, 9042, 9160).
Risk: The security group rule allows ingress from the internet to Cassandra ports (TCP 7000, 7001, 7199, 9042, 9160). This can expose the Cassandra service to the internet.

Recommendation.Text: Modify the security group to remove the rule that allows ingress from the internet to TCP ports 7000, 7001, 7199, 9042 or 9160.
